title: Loughborough University is awarded University of the Year by The Times and Sunday Times
description: Loughborough has been named University of the Year by The Times and Sunday Times University Guide 2019.

title: Internationally-recognised Brexit researcher joins the Institute for Diplomacy and International Governance
description: Dr Tim Oliver has been appointed as Senior Lecturer for the Institute for Diplomacy and International Governance at Loughborough University London.

title: Loughborough University London to host ADIM International Research Conference 2019
description: The Academy for Design Innovation Management International Research Conference will be hosted by Loughborough University London next summer.

title: 'Socio-Economic Value at Elephant and Castle' report released
description: Socio-Economic Value at the Elephant and Castle (2018) is a collaborative research project which supplements the existing research conducted by Latin Elephant on the spaces and practices of trade at the Elephant and Castle Shopping Centre.

title: Loughborough part of successful AHRC funded Doctoral Training Partnership
description: Loughborough University London is part of a consortium of universities in London and the south east that form a national Doctoral Training Partnership (DTP) focusing on the arts and humanities disciplines.

title: Loughborough University London to host SMS conference extension this September
description: Loughborough University London and the Society for Advancement of Management Studies will host an extension of the Strategic Management Society (SMS) 38th Annual Conference this September.

title: Loughborough to host world's first professional course for sports agents in London
description: Loughborough University and the Association of Football Agents will launch a professional certificate for aspiring football agents later this year.

title: Loughborough University London supports fascinating community projects through new funding initiative
description: Loughborough University London has awarded nine charities and organisations with donations, as part of the new London Open Fund initiative.

title: UK Government announces two-year fees and funding promise for EU students
description: EU students at universities in England will continue to pay UK fees and receive UK funding until 2019-20.

title: Loughborough University London celebrates students who have improved their entrepreneurial and employability skills
description: Loughborough University London marked the achievements of two of its learning communities earlier this month.

title: Brexit Café in the East Midlands: Conversations amongst the confusion
description: On 13 July 2018, academics from Loughborough University London’s Institute for Diplomacy and International Governance, hosted a Brexit Café at our East Midlands campus as part of their 28+ Perspectives on Brexit project.

title: Loughborough University launches Global Disability Innovation Hub
description: Yesterday (11 July), Loughborough University London celebrated the launch of its partnership for the Global Disability Innovation Hub (GDIH).

title: The Conversation - Can the bond between Macron and Merkel keep the rest of the EU united?
description: Professor Helen Drake has written an article for The Conversation this week: Can the bond between Macron and Merkel keep the rest of the EU united?

title: Three Sport Business Doctoral Researchers to present at the European Sport Management Conference
description: Three of our Institute for Sport Business PhD students have been selected to present their papers at the European Sport Management Conference taking place in Malmö, Sweden in early September 2018.

title: Loughborough University London to contribute to project that aims to double female and BAME founders by 2020
description: Loughborough University London is to study the effectiveness of a recently-launched initiative that aims to provide female entrepreneurs, and those from some of capital’s most under-represented communities, with the opportunity to start and scale a high growth tech business.

title: Loughborough University London academic attends United Nations meeting
description: A Loughborough University London academic was invited to a United Nations meeting earlier this week for her expertise on sport’s contribution to society.

title: Institute for Sport Business academics publish new book
description: Three of our academics within the Institute for Sport Business have published a new book, entitled ‘Fostering Innovative Cultures in Sport’.

title: Design Innovation students to present their papers at International conferences
description: Two of our current students within the Institute for Design Innovation, Boeun Bethany and Dorota, have had papers accepted for international conferences in Milan and London.

title: Loughborough University London Crowns ‘The London Entrepreneurs’ Challenge Champions 2018
description: Monday 4th June 2018 marked the final of Loughborough University London’s £3k Entrepreneur Challenge (E-Challenge) 2018.

title: Loughborough University leaps back into UK top five
description: Loughborough University has been ranked 4th in the 2019 Guardian University Guide, rising two places from last year. It also has 21 of its 28 subject areas ranked in the national top ten.
